description: Police said they were keeping an open mind as to the cause of the man's injuries.
title: Man found inside van with serious head injury
title_page: Man found inside van with serious head injury in Lyneham - BBC News
maintext:
A man remains in hospital after being found with a serious head injury inside a van.
Wiltshire Police received a call from the ambulance service at about 17:40 GMT on Sunday after the man, who is in his 30s, was found in Lancaster Square, Lyneham.
He was later taken to hospital for treatment, where he remains.
The force said they were keeping an open mind as to the cause of the man's injuries and urged anyone with information to contact them.
